caseTitle: Gulzar Ahmad & others v. Muhammad Aslam (decd.) thr. LRs  & others
tagline: (1) Discussion on Section 12, 19, 20 and 27 of Specific Relief Act. (2) Concept of bona fide purchaser without notice. (3) Halsbury’s Laws of England with regard to penalty clause. (4) Article 117 & 119 of Qanun-e-Shahadat Order, 1984. (5) Section 100 C.P.C. (6) Section 55 of Transfer of Property Act.
